channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: $3M worth of customer funds swiped via alleged Swaprum DEX rug pull
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Promptly after the funds went missing, Swaprum’s Twitter, Telegram and Github accounts were all deleted, however its website is still up.

item.title: Users will decide if they can still trust Ledger with their seed phrases
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By J.W. Verret
item.description: Ledger’s decision to introduce a third party to your wallet seed phrase created an exploit that could appeal to both governments and hackers.

item.title: Bug in Aave V2 Polygon causes some assets to become stuck in contracts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The bug only affects the Polygon implementation, and V3 is unaffected

item.title: Blockchain technology platform Bakkt looks toward Europe after MiCA
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Bakkt’s chief product officer, Dan O’Prey, expressed his optimism about the future of Bitcoin and the company’s outlook on regulated markets when he chatted with Cointelegraph at Bitcoin 2023.

item.title: Tether, KriptonMarket to support USDT transactions at Argentina’s Central Market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The Central Market supplies over 12 million people per month in Argentina. The move will allow companies to accept and pay bills with USDT.

item.title: Ethereum users are increasingly demanding self-custody: Casa CTO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Security expert Jameson Lopp said some users lost Ethereum tokens because of the lack of a secure storage method.

item.title: Bitcoin production growth and capital strategy guiding Marathon Digital: CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: In an exclusive interview with Cointelegraph at the Bitcoin Conference, Marathon Digital CEO Fred Thiel spoke about the mining company’s response to the bear market.

item.title: BitDAO passes BIP-21 token optimization and branding proposal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.category: a proposal seeking to rebrand the BitDAO governance structure and Mantle network under the Mantle name passed with a large majority on May 19.
item.description: A proposal to unify branding between the Mantle network and BitDAO passed with overwhelming support.

item.title: US Justice Department on the hunt for DeFi hackers and thieves: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The total value locked in DeFi protocols fell below $50 billion after nearly a month of bullish price action.

item.title: Price analysis 5/19: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The recovery in Bitcoin and most major altcoins halted near respective overhead resistance levels, indicating that the bears are active at higher levels.

item.title: Ripple and SEC seek extension for unsealing Hinman documents
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to court documents shared by James Filan, the Hinman materials will likely be unsealed by June 13.

item.title: NY Fed and MAS publish joint CBDC cross-border payment project results
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The researchers built on their separate projects to demonstrate cross-border payments using illiquid currencies with an intermediate “vehicle” currency.

item.title: Bitcoin cleans up the environment and helps catch criminals: US Senator Cynthia Lummis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: U.S. Senator Cynthia Lummis joined Chamber of Digital Commerce CEO Perianne Boring on stage at Bitcoin 2023 in Miami for a lengthy discussion on regulation.

item.title: Breaking: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to accept campaign donations in Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: It is the first political campaign in U.S. history to accept Bitcoin donations.

item.title: Jack Dorsey’s TBD announces new Web5 toolkit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The Web5 toolkit aspires to put the control of data and identity into the hands of users.

item.title: MIAX completes acquisition of FTX subsidiary LedgerX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The deal was announced in April and approved by the bankruptcy judge on May 4.

item.title: U.S. debt ceiling crisis: bullish or bearish for Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: In the latest Cointelegraph Report, we assed the risk of a possible default in the U.S. and the impact of the debt ceiling crisis on crypto and the broader markets.

item.title: ‘Inferno Drainer’ scam as a service has stolen $5.9M since March: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The service provides code to scammers that allows them to drain wallets using token approval phishing methods.

item.title: Bitcoin flips volatile at $27K as Fed’s Powell teases end to rate hikes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price action destabilizes as markets watch Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s language for hints of policy change.

item.title: Twitter partnership created a ‘symbiosis,’ says eToro US CEO | Bitcoin Miami 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Lule Demmissie, CEO of eToro US, says that the new partnership with Twitter creates a symbiosis between social networks and social trading.

item.title: Paraspace NFT protocol 'usurper' resigns after failing to overthrow CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The Paraspace CEO and consultants accused each other of mismanaging funds with the Paraspace team asking the CEO to step down publically.

item.title: Bitcoin maximalism cool in 2023? Joe Hall shares his thoughts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: Bitcoin advocate Joe Hall believes that all other cryptocurrency projects will collapse into Bitcoin in the coming years.

item.title: Bitcoin price risk? US debt deal to trigger $1T liquidity crunch, analyst warns
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Bitcoin price could drop to $20,000 in Q3 amid mounting worries about a potential cash liquidity crisis led by the U.S. Treasury Department.

item.title: Stablecoin survival: Navigating the future amid global de-dollarization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The stablecoins with the largest market cap are pegged to the U.S. dollar, so what risk does de-dollarization pose to stablecoin users?

item.title: NFTs in the academy: Fighting fake credentials and unfair wages
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Pepperdine University professor Beau Brannan believes that NFTs could allow verification for individual courses and give more insight into college degrees.

item.title: Web3 zombie apocalypse is here: Last Remains joins Cointelegraph Accelerator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Backed by industry heavyweights; this new blockchain game aims to get a foothold in the competitive arena.

item.title: Bitcoin price retests key support as Fed rate hike fears steal $27K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls fail to stem fresh losses, with BTC price abandoning prior strength and opportunistic whales manipulating the arena with liquidity.

item.title: Apple bans ChatGPT use for employees over fears of data leaks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: An internal document from the tech giant said that while it develops its own AI technology, employee usage of outside AI chatbots will be restricted.

item.title: Texas proof-of-reserve bill passes through the Senate
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The legislation would oblige exchanges to maintain reserves “in an amount sufficient to fulfill all obligations to customers.”

item.title: Australian stock exchange officially abandons blockchain plans: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: ASX has abandoned its software rebuild using blockchain technology to explore more conventional options.
